1.0.name: wordpress/wp-dailyburn
1.0.description:
A DailyBurn widget for your WordPress blog.

DailyBurn is a great website if you're trying to lose weight or get in shape. You can count calories, track your weight loss and exercise progress, and find other like-minded healthy folks to discuss health related topics, and offer encouragement to each other.

The WP-DailyBurn widget displays your DailyBurn profile stats in your blog's sidebar.
